title: How to Make Whole Wheat Banana Bread Mini Muffins

steps.headline: Make the batter.
steps.description: Thoroughly mix all the ingredients (bananas last) in a large bowl.

steps.headline: Pour the mixture into a pre-greased mini muffin pan, about 2/3 full.
Allow to completely cool on a wire rack.

text: Preheat the oven to 350ºF/180ºC.  Make the batter. Thoroughly mix all the ingredients (bananas last) in a large bowl. Pour the mixture into a pre-greased mini muffin pan, about 2/3 full.  Bake the muffins for 20 minutes.  Allow to completely cool on a wire rack.
